node shuffle/shuffle_generation.js shuffleGenerator 04A "key1,key2,key3"
node ecdsa/sign.js signAndVerify 04A priv 04pub hash r s

2a. node shuffle/shuffle_generation.js shuffleGenerator tokenAddress prevShuffle "key1,key2,key3" 04A
2b. uploadShuffle
3b. node ecdsa/sign.js signAndVerify 04A priv sender
3c. withdrawAmt







1. Need easily copyable accumulated constant for the verify step
2. Shuffle generation output should be tidy
